text: Vasily Dmitrievich Zvyagintsev (; November 21, 1944Василий Дмитриевич Звягинцев - April 30, 2016) was a Russian science fiction author. He was born in Grozny. He wrote his only novel series Odysseus leaves Ithaca, set during World War II. The series was liked by literary critics. It contains more than 10 volumes. He won the Aelita Prize, Interpesscon, А. R.
